title: ISic000397. I.Sicily inscription 000397
body:
Facsimile Images

1cross_greekHICREQUIESCITIOHANNISFILIUSTAR
2RICQUIVIXITANTRISMENDUODIESXVI
3DEPINPACEXVIIKALIANUARIASINDXIIII

l.2 reg., orig. TRIStris

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro, controlled against photograph

English translation

Here lies Tarric son of Iohannis, who lived for 3 years, 2 months, 16 days. Laid to rest in peace, the 17th day before the Kalends of January, in the 14th indiction.

commentary

bibliography

  • Ferrara 1829 376 no.4, 378 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002005

  • Ferrua 1982-1983 28 no. 99 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001996
  • Ferrua 1989 no. 452 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
